definition: to be expecting/to be with child
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: Recall bygones, there are joys and worries, both.
sentences.chinese: 回忆往事，有喜有忧，两者皆有。

sentences.english: Twelve years, evening, asked in the field see don't feel happy hunting.
sentences.chinese: 十二年，暮归，在田野问见田猎者，不觉有喜。

sentences.english: The status quo of our party′s conviction is as much satiafactory as challenging.
sentences.chinese: 我们党的现实信仰状况有喜也有忧。

sentences.english: How to hear to eight congratulating Jins in an interesting condition not happy?
sentences.chinese: 怎么听八福晋有喜了就不高兴了呢？

sentences.english: There were mixed fortunes for French rugby teams on tour.
sentences.chinese: 参加巡回比赛的法国橄榄球队成绩有喜有悲。

sentences.english: From the looks of her, she must have sprained her ankle some months ago.
sentences.chinese: 从她的神态看，她肯定几个月前就有喜了。

definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
Thank you for your congratulations!/The same to you! (returning a compliment)
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
to add a son to the family
bitterness finishes, sweetness begins (idiom); the hard times are over, the good times just beginning
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
